text: José Manuel Mireles Valverde (24 October 1958 - 25 November 2020) was a Mexican medical doctor and activist. He founded the paramilitary self-defense groups that fought against the Knights Templar Cartel. He would support people shooting at cartel members out of self-defense. He was arrested for having illegal firearms and explosives in 2014. On 25 November 2020, Mireles Valverde died from COVID-19 at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican activists Category:Mexican physicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico
